name: Hasimir's testing area
body:
Rebooted
========

There's going to be a lot of branches at this rate if I have to wipe all content every time I try a different theme.

Of course the way around that is to not use the site repo to keep track of the content, do that elsewhere and export to the publishing repo when ready.  That way you can even destroy the entire thing and start from scratch if you need to.

Another option, of course, is th avoid the auto-generated stuff altogether and use something like Sphinx.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
